Reason_for_Retention: CSK captain and opening batter. Joint-highest retained/traded player at ₹18 crore. Consistent performer with strong domestic credentials. Leads the team with tactical acumen.
India wicketkeeper-batter traded from RR. Joint-highest at ₹18 crore. Explosive 2025 domestic form (500+ runs at 180+ SR). Brings captaincy experience and international credentials to CSK.
Dynamic middle-order all-rounder retained at ₹12 crore. Valuable finishing and bowling capabilities. Consistent performer in IPL with international experience.
Afghan leg-spinner retained at ₹10 crore. Brings international experience and unique bowling angles. Valuable spin option in CSK attack.
Left-arm pacer retained at ₹4.8 crore. International experience with proven death-overs capability. Important for balanced fast-bowling attack.
Legendary CSK leader retained at ₹4 crore as mentor-wicketkeeper. IPL greatest, 267 matches, guiding young squad development. Symbol of franchise continuity.
Young pace all-rounder retained at ₹3.4 crore. Uncapped prospect with potential. Part of CSK youth investment strategy.
Fast bowler retained at ₹2.2 crore. Missed most of last season through injury. Provides domestic pace depth after recovery.
